title: iOS 14.4: Release Candidate available to beta testers
content:
Just two days after releasing iOS 14.3 with several significant new features like ProRAW photos and Fitness+, Apple started the beta testing process for iOS 14.4. While this is a full point-release number than a minor one (e.g. iOS 14.3.1), there are very few significant user-facing changes.

Update 01/21/21: Apple has delivered the Release Candidate for iOS 14.4 to developers and public beta testers. The final release will likely be available to all next week.
